00096 int
00097 Cudd_ApaNumberOfDigits(
00098   int  binaryDigits)
00099 {
00100     int digits;
00101 
00102     digits = binaryDigits / DD_APA_BITS;
00103     if ((digits * DD_APA_BITS) != binaryDigits)
00104         digits++;
00105     return(digits);
00106 
00107 } /* end of Cudd_ApaNumberOfDigits */

00143 void
00144 Cudd_ApaCopy(
00145   int  digits,
00146   DdApaNumber  source,
00147   DdApaNumber  dest)
00148 {
00149     int i;
00150 
00151     for (i = 0; i < digits; i++) {
00152         dest[i] = source[i];
00153     }
00154 
00155 } /* end of Cudd_ApaCopy */

00170 DdApaDigit
00171 Cudd_ApaAdd(
00172   int  digits,
00173   DdApaNumber  a,
00174   DdApaNumber  b,
00175   DdApaNumber  sum)
00176 {
00177     int i;
00178     DdApaDoubleDigit partial = 0;
00179 
00180     for (i = digits - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00181         partial = a[i] + b[i] + DD_MSDIGIT(partial);
00182         sum[i] = (DdApaDigit) DD_LSDIGIT(partial);
00183     }
00184     return(DD_MSDIGIT(partial));
00185 
00186 } /* end of Cudd_ApaAdd */

00202 DdApaDigit
00203 Cudd_ApaSubtract(
00204   int  digits,
00205   DdApaNumber  a,
00206   DdApaNumber  b,
00207   DdApaNumber  diff)
00208 {
00209     int i;
00210     DdApaDoubleDigit partial = DD_APA_BASE;
00211 
00212     for (i = digits - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00213         partial = a[i] - b[i] + DD_MSDIGIT(partial) + DD_APA_MASK;
00214         diff[i] = (DdApaDigit) DD_LSDIGIT(partial);
00215     }
00216     return(DD_MSDIGIT(partial) - 1);
00217 
00218 } /* end of Cudd_ApaSubtract */

00232 DdApaDigit
00233 Cudd_ApaShortDivision(
00234   int  digits,
00235   DdApaNumber  dividend,
00236   DdApaDigit  divisor,
00237   DdApaNumber  quotient)
00238 {
00239     int i;
00240     DdApaDigit remainder;
00241     DdApaDoubleDigit partial;
00242 
00243     remainder = 0;
00244     for (i = 0; i < digits; i++) {
00245         partial = remainder * DD_APA_BASE + dividend[i];
00246         quotient[i] = (DdApaDigit) (partial/(DdApaDoubleDigit)divisor);
00247         remainder = (DdApaDigit) (partial % divisor);
00248     }
00249 
00250     return(remainder);
00251 
00252 } /* end of Cudd_ApaShortDivision */

00273 unsigned int
00274 Cudd_ApaIntDivision(
00275   int  digits,
00276   DdApaNumber dividend,
00277   unsigned int divisor,
00278   DdApaNumber quotient)
00279 {
00280     int i;
00281     double partial;
00282     unsigned int remainder = 0;
00283     double ddiv = (double) divisor;
00284 
00285     for (i = 0; i < digits; i++) {
00286         partial = (double) remainder * DD_APA_BASE + dividend[i];
00287         quotient[i] = (DdApaDigit) (partial / ddiv);
00288         remainder = (unsigned int) (partial - ((double)quotient[i] * ddiv));
00289     }
00290 
00291     return(remainder);
00292 
00293 } /* end of Cudd_ApaIntDivision */

00310 void
00311 Cudd_ApaShiftRight(
00312   int  digits,
00313   DdApaDigit  in,
00314   DdApaNumber  a,
00315   DdApaNumber  b)
00316 {
00317     int i;
00318 
00319     for (i = digits - 1; i > 0; i--) {
00320         b[i] = (a[i] >> 1) | ((a[i-1] & 1) << (DD_APA_BITS - 1));
00321     }
00322     b[0] = (a[0] >> 1) | (in << (DD_APA_BITS - 1));
00323 
00324 } /* end of Cudd_ApaShiftRight */

00339 Cudd_ApaSetToLiteral(
00340   int  digits,
00341   DdApaNumber  number,
00342   DdApaDigit  literal)
00343 {
00344     int i;
00345 
00346     for (i = 0; i < digits - 1; i++)
00347         number[i] = 0;
00348     number[digits - 1] = literal;
00349 
00350 } /* end of Cudd_ApaSetToLiteral */

00366 void
00367 Cudd_ApaPowerOfTwo(
00368   int  digits,
00369   DdApaNumber  number,
00370   int  power)
00371 {
00372     int i;
00373     int index;
00374 
00375     for (i = 0; i < digits; i++)
00376         number[i] = 0;
00377     i = digits - 1 - power / DD_APA_BITS;
00378     if (i < 0) return;
00379     index = power & (DD_APA_BITS - 1);
00380     number[i] = 1 << index;
00381 
00382 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPowerOfTwo */

00398 int
00399 Cudd_ApaCompare(
00400   int digitsFirst,
00401   DdApaNumber  first,
00402   int digitsSecond,
00403   DdApaNumber  second)
00404 {
00405     int i;
00406     int firstNZ, secondNZ;
00407 
00408     /* Find first non-zero in both numbers. */
00409     for (firstNZ = 0; firstNZ < digitsFirst; firstNZ++)
00410         if (first[firstNZ] != 0) break;
00411     for (secondNZ = 0; secondNZ < digitsSecond; secondNZ++)
00412         if (second[secondNZ] != 0) break;
00413     if (digitsFirst - firstNZ > digitsSecond - secondNZ) return(1);
00414     else if (digitsFirst - firstNZ < digitsSecond - secondNZ) return(-1);
00415     for (i = 0; i < digitsFirst - firstNZ; i++) {
00416         if (first[firstNZ + i] > second[secondNZ + i]) return(1);
00417         else if (first[firstNZ + i] < second[secondNZ + i]) return(-1);
00418     }
00419     return(0);
00420 
00421 } /* end of Cudd_ApaCompare */

00438 int
00439 Cudd_ApaCompareRatios(
00440   int digitsFirst,
00441   DdApaNumber firstNum,
00442   unsigned int firstDen,
00443   int digitsSecond,
00444   DdApaNumber secondNum,
00445   unsigned int secondDen)
00446 {
00447     int result;
00448     DdApaNumber first, second;
00449     unsigned int firstRem, secondRem;
00450 
00451     first = Cudd_NewApaNumber(digitsFirst);
00452     firstRem = Cudd_ApaIntDivision(digitsFirst,firstNum,firstDen,first);
00453     second = Cudd_NewApaNumber(digitsSecond);
00454     secondRem = Cudd_ApaIntDivision(digitsSecond,secondNum,secondDen,second);
00455     result = Cudd_ApaCompare(digitsFirst,first,digitsSecond,second);
00456     if (result == 0) {
00457         if ((double)firstRem/firstDen > (double)secondRem/secondDen)
00458             return(1);
00459         else if ((double)firstRem/firstDen < (double)secondRem/secondDen)
00460             return(-1);
00461     }
00462     return(result);
00463 
00464 } /* end of Cudd_ApaCompareRatios */

00479 int
00480 Cudd_ApaPrintHex(
00481   FILE * fp,
00482   int  digits,
00483   DdApaNumber  number)
00484 {
00485     int i, result;
00486 
00487     for (i = 0; i < digits; i++) {
00488         result = fprintf(fp,DD_APA_HEXPRINT,number[i]);
00489         if (result == EOF)
00490             return(0);
00491     }
00492     return(1);
00493 
00494 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPrintHex */

00509 int
00510 Cudd_ApaPrintDecimal(
00511   FILE * fp,
00512   int  digits,
00513   DdApaNumber  number)
00514 {
00515     int i, result;
00516     DdApaDigit remainder;
00517     DdApaNumber work;
00518     unsigned char *decimal;
00519     int leadingzero;
00520     int decimalDigits = (int) (digits * log10((double) DD_APA_BASE)) + 1;
00521     
00522     work = Cudd_NewApaNumber(digits);
00523     if (work == NULL)
00524         return(0);
00525     decimal = ALLOC(unsigned char, decimalDigits);
00526     if (decimal == NULL) {
00527         FREE(work);
00528         return(0);
00529     }
00530     Cudd_ApaCopy(digits,number,work);
00531     for (i = decimalDigits - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00532         remainder = Cudd_ApaShortDivision(digits,work,(DdApaDigit) 10,work);
00533         decimal[i] = remainder;
00534     }
00535     FREE(work);
00536 
00537     leadingzero = 1;
00538     for (i = 0; i < decimalDigits; i++) {
00539         leadingzero = leadingzero && (decimal[i] == 0);
00540         if ((!leadingzero) || (i == (decimalDigits - 1))) {
00541             result = fprintf(fp,"%1d",decimal[i]);
00542             if (result == EOF) {
00543                 FREE(decimal);
00544                 return(0);
00545             }
00546         }
00547     }
00548     FREE(decimal);
00549     return(1);
00550 
00551 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPrintDecimal */
00552 
00553 
00566 int
00567 Cudd_ApaPrintExponential(
00568   FILE * fp,
00569   int  digits,
00570   DdApaNumber  number,
00571   int precision)
00572 {
00573     int i, first, last, result;
00574     DdApaDigit remainder;
00575     DdApaNumber work;
00576     unsigned char *decimal;
00577     int decimalDigits = (int) (digits * log10((double) DD_APA_BASE)) + 1;
00578     
00579     work = Cudd_NewApaNumber(digits);
00580     if (work == NULL)
00581         return(0);
00582     decimal = ALLOC(unsigned char, decimalDigits);
00583     if (decimal == NULL) {
00584         FREE(work);
00585         return(0);
00586     }
00587     Cudd_ApaCopy(digits,number,work);
00588     first = decimalDigits - 1;
00589     for (i = decimalDigits - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00590         remainder = Cudd_ApaShortDivision(digits,work,(DdApaDigit) 10,work);
00591         decimal[i] = remainder;
00592         if (remainder != 0) first = i; /* keep track of MS non-zero */
00593     }
00594     FREE(work);
00595     last = ddMin(first + precision, decimalDigits);
00596 
00597     for (i = first; i < last; i++) {
00598         result = fprintf(fp,"%s%1d",i == first+1 ? "." : "", decimal[i]);
00599         if (result == EOF) {
00600             FREE(decimal);
00601             return(0);
00602         }
00603     }
00604     FREE(decimal);
00605     result = fprintf(fp,"e+%d",decimalDigits - first - 1);
00606     if (result == EOF) {
00607         return(0);
00608     }
00609     return(1);
00610 
00611 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPrintExponential */

00613 
00631 DdApaNumber
00632 Cudd_ApaCountMinterm(
00633   DdManager * manager,
00634   DdNode * node,
00635   int  nvars,
00636   int * digits)
00637 {
00638     DdApaNumber max, min;
00639     st_table    *table;
00640     DdApaNumber i,count;        
00641 
00642     background = manager->background;
00643     zero = Cudd_Not(manager->one);
00644 
00645     *digits = Cudd_ApaNumberOfDigits(nvars+1);
00646     max = Cudd_NewApaNumber(*digits);
00647     if (max == NULL) {
00648         return(NULL);
00649     }
00650     Cudd_ApaPowerOfTwo(*digits,max,nvars);
00651     min = Cudd_NewApaNumber(*digits);
00652     if (min == NULL) {
00653         FREE(max);
00654         return(NULL);
00655     }
00656     Cudd_ApaSetToLiteral(*digits,min,0);
00657     table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00658     if (table == NULL) {
00659         FREE(max);
00660         FREE(min);
00661         return(NULL);
00662     }
00663     i = cuddApaCountMintermAux(Cudd_Regular(node),*digits,max,min,table);
00664     if (i == NULL) {
00665         FREE(max);
00666         FREE(min);
00667         st_foreach(table, cuddApaStCountfree, NULL);
00668         st_free_table(table);
00669         return(NULL);
00670     }
00671     count = Cudd_NewApaNumber(*digits);
00672     if (count == NULL) {
00673         FREE(max);
00674         FREE(min);
00675         st_foreach(table, cuddApaStCountfree, NULL);
00676         st_free_table(table);
00677         if (Cudd_Regular(node)->ref == 1) FREE(i);
00678         return(NULL);
00679     }
00680     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
00681         (void) Cudd_ApaSubtract(*digits,max,i,count);
00682     } else {
00683         Cudd_ApaCopy(*digits,i,count);
00684     }
00685     FREE(max);
00686     FREE(min);
00687     st_foreach(table, cuddApaStCountfree, NULL);
00688     st_free_table(table);
00689     if (Cudd_Regular(node)->ref == 1) FREE(i);
00690     return(count);
00691 
00692 } /* end of Cudd_ApaCountMinterm */
00693 
00694 
00708 int
00709 Cudd_ApaPrintMinterm(
00710   FILE * fp,
00711   DdManager * dd,
00712   DdNode * node,
00713   int  nvars)
00714 {
00715     int digits;
00716     int result;
00717     DdApaNumber count;
00718 
00719     count = Cudd_ApaCountMinterm(dd,node,nvars,&digits);
00720     if (count == NULL)
00721         return(0);
00722     result = Cudd_ApaPrintDecimal(fp,digits,count);
00723     FREE(count);
00724     if (fprintf(fp,"\n") == EOF) {
00725         return(0);
00726     }
00727     return(result);
00728 
00729 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPrintMinterm */

00747 int
00748 Cudd_ApaPrintMintermExp(
00749   FILE * fp,
00750   DdManager * dd,
00751   DdNode * node,
00752   int  nvars,
00753   int precision)
00754 {
00755     int digits;
00756     int result;
00757     DdApaNumber count;
00758 
00759     count = Cudd_ApaCountMinterm(dd,node,nvars,&digits);
00760     if (count == NULL)
00761         return(0);
00762     result = Cudd_ApaPrintExponential(fp,digits,count,precision);
00763     FREE(count);
00764     if (fprintf(fp,"\n") == EOF) {
00765         return(0);
00766     }
00767     return(result);
00768 
00769 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPrintMintermExp */

00785 int
00786 Cudd_ApaPrintDensity(
00787   FILE * fp,
00788   DdManager * dd,
00789   DdNode * node,
00790   int  nvars)
00791 {
00792     int digits;
00793     int result;
00794     DdApaNumber count,density;
00795     unsigned int size, remainder, fractional;
00796 
00797     count = Cudd_ApaCountMinterm(dd,node,nvars,&digits);
00798     if (count == NULL)
00799         return(0);
00800     size = Cudd_DagSize(node);
00801     density = Cudd_NewApaNumber(digits);
00802     remainder = Cudd_ApaIntDivision(digits,count,size,density);
00803     result = Cudd_ApaPrintDecimal(fp,digits,density);
00804     FREE(count);
00805     FREE(density);
00806     fractional = (unsigned int)((double)remainder / size * 1000000);
00807     if (fprintf(fp,".%u\n", fractional) == EOF) {
00808         return(0);
00809     }
00810     return(result);
00811 
00812 } /* end of Cudd_ApaPrintDensity */

00842 static DdApaNumber
00843 cuddApaCountMintermAux(
00844   DdNode * node,
00845   int  digits,
00846   DdApaNumber  max,
00847   DdApaNumber  min,
00848   st_table * table)
00849 {
00850     DdNode      *Nt, *Ne;
00851     DdApaNumber mint, mint1, mint2;
00852     DdApaDigit  carryout;
00853 
00854     if (cuddIsConstant(node)) {
00855         if (node == background || node == zero) {
00856             return(min);
00857         } else {
00858             return(max);
00859         }
00860     }
00861     if (node->ref > 1 && st_lookup(table, (char *)node, (char **)&mint)) {
00862         return(mint);
00863     }
00864 
00865     Nt = cuddT(node); Ne = cuddE(node);
00866 
00867     mint1 = cuddApaCountMintermAux(Nt,  digits, max, min, table);
00868     if (mint1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00869     mint2 = cuddApaCountMintermAux(Cudd_Regular(Ne), digits, max, min, table);
00870     if (mint2 == NULL) return(NULL);
00871     mint = Cudd_NewApaNumber(digits);
00872     if (mint == NULL) {
00873         return(NULL);
00874     }
00875     if (Cudd_IsComplement(Ne)) {
00876         (void) Cudd_ApaSubtract(digits,max,mint2,mint);
00877         carryout = Cudd_ApaAdd(digits,mint1,mint,mint);
00878     } else {
00879         carryout = Cudd_ApaAdd(digits,mint1,mint2,mint);
00880     }
00881     Cudd_ApaShiftRight(digits,carryout,mint,mint);
00882     if (Cudd_Regular(Nt)->ref == 1) FREE(mint1);
00883     if (Cudd_Regular(Ne)->ref == 1) FREE(mint2);
00884     
00885     if (node->ref > 1) {
00886         if (st_insert(table, (char *)node, (char *)mint) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00887             FREE(mint);
00888             return(NULL);
00889         }
00890     }
00891     return(mint);
00892 
00893 } /* end of cuddApaCountMintermAux */

00907 static enum st_retval
00908 cuddApaStCountfree(
00909   char * key,
00910   char * value,
00911   char * arg)
00912 {
00913     DdApaNumber d;
00914 
00915     d = (DdApaNumber) value;
00916     FREE(d);
00917     return(ST_CONTINUE);
00918 
00919 } /* end of cuddApaStCountfree */
